name: Animal Taming
description: Tame animals, have pets, and teach them to perform a variety of commands. Be careful trying to tame wild and dangerous beasts thoughâ€¦

name: Appraisal
description: Understanding of the worth of goods of various rarities, types, and brands.

name: Archeology
description: Knowledge and understanding of what ancient ruins and artifacts were used for.

name: Brawling
description: Rough and tumble fist fights and knockout boxing manuevers.

name: Brewing
description: The ability to brew and create various forms of alcoholic beverages and potions

name: Bullying
description: Knowledge of strategies to intimidate or coerce others who are more vulnerable than you.

name: Business
description: Skills to succeed in commerce, bargaining, and trade.

name: Camping
description: Make the best out of sleeping out in the wilderness. Building fires, keeping watch, and staying rested even in the wilds.

name: Carousing
description: Drink plentiful amounts of alcohol, develop tolerances, and make connections with others.

name: Climbing
description: Effectively, and speedily scale and climb up slopes, walls, trees, ropes, etc.

name: Contacts
description: You have made friends all over. Learn how to develop and make best use of your relationships with others.

name: Cooking
description: Improve in your skill of preparing food by combining, mixing, and heating ingredients.

name: Costume Design
description: Adjust and alter clothing to fit a performer, or even disguise yourself when you need to hide among others.

name: Counsel
description: Care for and listen to others, offer advice and give help to them regarding their problems.

name: Crafting
description: Skills related to designing or making useful, functional, and beautiful items by hand.

name: Dancing
description: Learn to move rhythmically to music, practice beeing light on your feet, and learn how to avoid falling.

name: Debate
description: Gain skills to formally discuss and argue to both individuals and crowds.

name: Demolition
description: The art and science of efficiently breaking and blowing stuff up.

name: Diplomacy
description: Learn the skills you need to deal with others in a sensitive and effective way; particularly with international relations.

name: Entertainment
description: Understand how to bring others amusement, enjoyment, and a lively performance.

name: Fishing
description: Use knowledge of the sea, sailing, and your own sensitive touch to catch rare, delicious, and sometimes dangerous aquatic creatures.

name: Gambling
description: Improve your odds at winning in games of "chance" by playing others and rigging the game.

name: Gymnastics
description: Develop and display physical agility and coordination. Learn to take a fall safely, and move around the battlefield more efficiently.

name: Heroism
description: Display great bravery to put others first above yourself, even to your own peril.

name: Intrigue
description: Arouse your curiosity and interest, question others and learn secrets.

name: Investigation
description: Discover how ciminals and law enforcers think, and find things that are hidden quickly and efficiently.

name: Jumping
description: Learn techniques to improve your long and high jumps to go further and higher.

name: Leadership
description: Influence, guide, and lead individuals or groups to do perform at a higher level.

name: Linguistics
description: Study language and the structure of how different groups of people communicate.

name: Lying
description: Swindle and fool others. Bury lies within lies. Become a master of cons and deception

name: Mechanics
description: Gain the skills needed to work on and repair machines and other such technology.

name: Medicine
description: The practice of diagnosing, treating, and preventing diseases and other illnesses. Healing others of their wounds.

name: Navigation
description: Accurately ascertain your precise location in reference to other locations. Plotting and following a route.

name: Piloting
description: Competence in operating any and all mechanically powered vehicles, including air and watercraft.

name: Riding
description: Ability to effectively ride creatures and fight while mounted. Also applies to small 1 man vehicles such as motorcycles.

name: Running
description: You love to run and you can keep going all day long. Whereas speed is how fast you are, End (Running) is how far you can go.

name: Sailing
description: Competence in operating any and all sailing vessels large and small.

name: Scholarship
description: You have learned the skills needed to improve your long term memory and information retention.

name: Scouting
description: The ability to track your prey quickly, learn information from examining tracks, and keeping watch from prying eyes.

name: Smithing
description: The ability to smith weapons and armor to produce masterful works of art and war. Learn how to effectively work with different metals.

name: Sneaking
description: Learn how to move about in a stealthy manner, avoid notice, and hide in plain sight.

name: Stealing
description: Learn the skills necessary to efficiently and efectively pick pockets and locks.

name: Swimming
description: The practice of holding your breath, swimming long distances, and even swimming faster.

name: Toughness
description: You have learned how to adapt to whatever life throws at you, hold your own when outnumbered, and fight through the pain of injury.

name: Weight Lifting
description: Improve at your ability to lift heavy objects and your techniques in avoiding injury.

name: Wrestling
description: Learn new grappling techniques to bring down your foes without using weapons.

name: Zen
description: The act of calming your emotions and meditating to achieve enlightnemnet.
